name: How high, how many.
description:
Ludum Dare 49.   Theme  "UNSTABLE"

This is game about stacking different shaped objects.

Grab and release the object into the center grey circle, be careful that the object that you drop, don't touch red stripe( " DO NOT CROSS " around the grey circle). 

There will be a point where stacked objects will be UNSTABLE and fall.

The question is, how high or how many objects can you pile on top of each other before it gets unstable. 

Get high score and place your name on the leaderboard!!

IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES PLAYING ON THE BROWSER, please download the compressed file for better gaming experience.

How to Play

The player  has 25 secs to grab an object and release it at the center circle  to get the timer to rest or otherwise you lose. 

If the cube slips and touches the red  ring where it says " Do not cross ",  you lose. 

Control :

W,A,S,D  to move

SPACE Bar once to grab and second SPACE bar releases.

ENTER key to pause
